name: Traurig Secrets: Prologue
description:
Do you have secrets? Of course you do: everyone does. But how sinister are yours? You don't have to answer that one. We are, however, all curious sometimes what skeletons other people might have in their closets... The protagonist is Satou Ishida, an amnesiac student at the International Galactic University who embarks on a dark and thorny path to find answers to the burning questions regarding his friends, the college administration, and himself...

Features:
  • A dark narrative with comedic undertones
  • Many choices that shape the outcome of the story
  • Four possible love interests each with their own unique personality
